_sText:
Okay. This might look like the original koth but i made some changes that i thin you might like. I change the textures and added in two rooms. And for anyone that just hates the ppl that go up onto the tower and awp there is a button in the rooms that kill whoever is up there :). And the best part is that there is a camera so u can watch the n00bs get blown away :D. Have fun
 
more of my maps at www.freewebs.com/sgtkickurass
